adding.context: This annotation type is used when adding new values to previously empty attributes.

commenting.context: This annotation type is used for commenting on specimen properties or other annotations.

linking.context: This annotation type is used when a false relationship or link is detected and needs to be replaced with a valid one.

correcting.context: This annotation type is used when correcting an existing value of an attribute that is deemed invalid.

quality_flagging.context: This annotation type is used when flagging a quality issue.
